description: Checks whether the image specified in a process creation event doesn't refer to an .exe file (caused by process ghosting or other unorthodox methods to start a process) Author: Max Altgelt. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Execution File Type Other Than .exe
query: ((NOT (process.executable:*.exe)) AND (NOT ((NOT _exists_:process.executable) OR (process.executable:"Registry") OR (process.executable:("\-" OR "")) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\Installer\\MSI*) OR (process.parent.executable:C\:\\ProgramData\\Avira\\*) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\* AND process.executable:*\\avira_speedup_setup_update.tmp) OR (process.executable:*.scr) OR (process.executable:*NVIDIA\\NvBackend\\* AND process.executable:*.dat) OR (process.executable:(C\:\\Windows\\System32\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*) AND process.executable:*.com) OR (process.executable:*\\WinSCP.com) OR (process.executable:*\\program\\soffice.bin) OR (process.executable:(*C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\is\-* OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\is\-*) AND process.executable:(*.tmp\\target.tmp OR *.tmp\\_isetup\\_setup64.tmp)))))
